/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. A car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is captured from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective. The colors in the image are rich and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
